projects.title: My old grimoire
projects.description: Book management application with authentication, ratings, and image handling. This full stack project was built with MongoDB, Node.js, Express, Multer, and JWT. It allowed me to master the entire processing chain of a secure API.

projects.title: Kasa - Real Estate Rental Platform
projects.description: Responsive web application built with React and Vite for a real estate rental platform. It features dynamic routing with React Router, a mobile-first approach, and components like a carousel and accordions. This project highlights a component-based architecture, prop management, and redirection to an error page.

projects.title: Architect Portfolio - Sophie Bluel
projects.description: Dynamic single-page web application developed in vanilla JavaScript. The app fetches project data from a REST API and allows authenticated users to delete and add projects via a modal interface. This project showcases DOM manipulation, asynchronous functions, API integration, and modal interface handling.
